name: A Realm Reborn - The New Beginning!
short_description: The relaunch of Final Fantasy XIV, featuring revamped gameplay and story.
full_description: A Realm Reborn is the rebirth of the original Final Fantasy XIV, featuring a complete overhaul of the game's systems and story. It introduces players to the reimagined world of Eorzea with a fresh narrative and new gameplay mechanics.

name: Patch 2.1 - A Realm Awoken
short_description: The first major patch for A Realm Reborn, adding new content and features.
full_description: Patch 2.1 introduces new content including the Crystal Tower raid and various quality-of-life improvements. It marks the beginning of additional content updates for A Realm Reborn.

name: Patch 2.2 - Through the Maelstrom
short_description: Adds new dungeons and story content to A Realm Reborn.
full_description: Patch 2.2 continues to expand A Realm Reborn with new dungeons, storylines, and additional features, enriching the gameplay experience and narrative.

name: Patch 2.3 - Defenders of Eorzea
short_description: Introduces new trials and story content.
full_description: Patch 2.3 features new trials, dungeons, and story content, further developing the world and storyline of A Realm Reborn.

name: Patch 2.4 - Dreams of Ice
short_description: Expands the game with new content and story developments.
full_description: Patch 2.4 brings new content and story developments, including the addition of the new dungeon and trial, enhancing the A Realm Reborn experience.

name: Patch 2.5 - Before the Fall
short_description: The final patch before Heavensward, setting up major storylines.
full_description: Patch 2.5 concludes the storylines of A Realm Reborn and sets the stage for the Heavensward expansion with significant content updates and story developments.

name: Heavensward - The Battle Rages On!
short_description: The first major expansion, featuring new regions and a dark storyline.
full_description: Heavensward expands the world of Final Fantasy XIV with a new region and an engaging story centered around the conflict between Ishgard and the Dravanian Horde. It introduces new jobs and dungeons, deepening the overall experience.

name: Patch 3.1 - As Goes Light, So Goes Darkness
short_description: Adds new content and features to Heavensward.
full_description: Patch 3.1 introduces new content and updates for Heavensward, including additional story quests, dungeons, and other gameplay enhancements.

name: Patch 3.2 - The Gears of Change
short_description: Continues the Heavensward story with new features.
full_description: Patch 3.2 continues the storyline of Heavensward with new content and features, including new dungeons, trials, and story quests.

name: Patch 3.3 - Revenge of the Horde
short_description: Expands the Heavensward experience with additional content.
full_description: Patch 3.3 expands Heavensward with new content, including additional storylines, dungeons, and trials, enhancing the overall experience.

name: Patch 3.4 - Soul Surrender
short_description: Adds more story content and features.
full_description: Patch 3.4 introduces new content and story developments, continuing the Heavensward narrative with new dungeons, trials, and quests.

name: Patch 3.5 - The Far Edge of Fate
short_description: The final patch before Stormblood, concluding major storylines.
full_description: Patch 3.5 concludes the Heavensward expansion with significant updates and content, preparing players for the upcoming Stormblood expansion.

name: Stormblood - The Fight for Freedom!
short_description: Focuses on the liberation of new regions with expanded content.
full_description: Stormblood brings players to Ala Mhigo and Doma, focusing on the fight against Garlean oppression. It introduces new jobs, areas, and storylines, expanding the Final Fantasy XIV universe.

name: Patch 4.1 - The Legend Returns
short_description: Adds new content and story elements to Stormblood.
full_description: Patch 4.1 continues the Stormblood expansion with new content, including additional story quests, dungeons, and features.

name: Patch 4.2 - The Legend Returns
short_description: Continues the Stormblood storyline with new updates.
full_description: Patch 4.2 adds more content and story developments to Stormblood, including new dungeons, trials, and features.

name: Patch 4.3 - Under the Moonlight
short_description: Expands the game with new content and story.
full_description: Patch 4.3 continues to build on the Stormblood expansion, introducing new storylines, dungeons, and gameplay features.

name: Patch 4.4 - Prelude in Violet
short_description: Adds more content and continues the storyline.
full_description: Patch 4.4 continues the Stormblood narrative with new content, including dungeons, trials, and story quests, enriching the game's experience.

name: Patch 4.5 - A Requiem for Heroes
short_description: The final patch before Shadowbringers, concluding major story arcs.
full_description: Patch 4.5 wraps up the Stormblood storyline and sets the stage for the upcoming Shadowbringers expansion, offering significant updates and content.

name: Shadowbringers - A Darkness Unleashed!
short_description: Takes players to a new world with an intense storyline.
full_description: Shadowbringers transports players to the First, a new world filled with light and darkness. It offers a compelling story, new jobs, and expansive content, making it one of the most acclaimed expansions.

name: Patch 5.1 - Vows of Virtue, Deeds of Cruelty
short_description: Adds new content and story elements to Shadowbringers.
full_description: Patch 5.1 continues the Shadowbringers storyline with new content, including additional quests, dungeons, and features.

name: Patch 5.2 - Echoes of a Fallen Star
short_description: Introduces more content and continues the story.
full_description: Patch 5.2 adds new content and story developments to Shadowbringers, including new dungeons, trials, and features.

name: Patch 5.3 - Reflections in Crystal
short_description: Expands the Shadowbringers experience with new features.
full_description: Patch 5.3 enhances the Shadowbringers experience with new content and story elements, including additional quests and dungeons.

name: Patch 5.4 - Futures Rewritten
short_description: Continues the storyline with new content and updates.
full_description: Patch 5.4 continues the Shadowbringers narrative with new content, including dungeons, trials, and story quests, further enhancing the gameplay experience.

name: Patch 5.5 - Death Unto Dawn
short_description: The final patch before Endwalker, concluding major storylines.
full_description: Patch 5.5 wraps up the Shadowbringers storyline and sets the stage for the upcoming Endwalker expansion, offering significant updates and content.

name: Endwalker - The Journey's End!
short_description: Concludes the story arc with new regions and an epic narrative.
full_description: Endwalker brings the current story arc to a dramatic conclusion, introducing new regions, jobs, and an expansive narrative. It offers a rich and immersive experience for players.
